official_title: To direct the President to submit to the Congress proposals to prevent, contain, disperse, and clean up oil spills on the territorial seas, coastal waters, inland waterways, and lands of the United States.

summary.text: Directs the President to report to the Congress proposals to prevent, contain, disperse, and clean up oil spills on the territorial seas, coastal waters, inland waterways, and lands of the United States.
